import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import MyTitle from '../../MyTitle/MyTitle' const CategoryTask = ({ category, tab, setTab, listItems, setListItem }) => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false) const clConfigBtn = ['category__configModal'] if (modal) clConfigBtn.push('open') useEffect(() => { const restartTab = () => setTab(listItems[0]) }, [tab]) const removeCategory = () => { restartTab() return setListItem(listItems.filter(e => e !== category)) } return (
{category}
Active tasks
Completed tasks
filtered by:
) } export default CategoryTask
